attributes.action: Discontinue support to the Israeli army and introduce sanctions.
attributes.additional_details: For many years, the Israeli government has carried out a discriminatory regime throughout Palestine, one that violates international humanitarian law and constitutes war crimes. The UK Government has not responded adequately. Recent UK arms exports have provided over £182 million worth of military equipment to the Israeli army in 2017. The government needs to publicly condemn these actions and impose a ban on arms trade with Israel.
attributes.background: To discontinue any diplomatic, financial support and aid offered to the Israeli military. Action to be taken against UK companies who conduct business with illegal Israeli settlements which violate human rights of the Palestinian people.
